metadata.name: Into the Night
metadata.description: Captivating aerial footage filmed by Pol Albarran shows the beautiful city of Barcelona, Spain at night. This video perfectly captures the alluring nightlife in the "City of Counts," which is a blend of enchanting lights, cars, and peace. Amid the stunning skyline, one can also spot the newsworthy "Sagrada Familia," a basilica that has been under construction since 1882.
